env HOME=$WORK/home

! gunk generate ./p1
stderr 'error: parameter type should not be repeated'

! gunk generate ./p2
stderr 'error: parameter type should not be repeated'

-- go.mod --
module testdata.tld/util
-- p1/doc.go --
package util // make this directory a Go package
-- p1/p1.gunk --
package util

type Message struct {
	Msg string `pb:"1"`
}

type Util interface {
	// Echo echoes a message.
	Echo(Message) []Message
}
-- p2/doc.go --
package util // make this directory a Go package
-- p2/p2.gunk --
package util

type Message struct {
	Msg string `pb:"1"`
}

type Util interface {
	// Echo echoes a message.
	Echo([]Message) Message
}
